dcterms:creator: M. A. Kupinski
H. H. Barrett
dcterms:description: A model used for signal detection-localization tasks that involves a lumpy background to emulate variability in imaging systems.
dcterms:title: Lumpy Background (LB) Model

dcterms:creator: F. O. Bochud
C. K. Abbey
M. P. Eckstein
dcterms:description: A model used for signal detection-localization tasks that involves a clustered lumpy background to synthesize mammographic image textures.
dcterms:title: Clustered Lumpy Background (CLB) Model

dcterms:creator: W. Zhou
H. Li
M. A. Anastasio
dcterms:description: Tasks involving signal detection and localization where the background is known exactly, allowing for performance assessment of imaging systems.
dcterms:title: BKE Signal Detection-Localization Tasks

dcterms:creator: W. Zhou
H. Li
M. A. Anastasio
dcterms:description: Tasks involving signal detection and localization where the background is known statistically, allowing for performance assessment of imaging systems.
dcterms:title: BKS Signal Detection-Localization Tasks

dcterms:creator: M. A. Kupinski
J. W. Hoppin
E. Clarkson
H. H. Barrett
dcterms:description: A method for computing likelihood ratios in medical imaging using Markov-Chain Monte Carlo techniques.
dcterms:title: MCMC Method for Likelihood Ratios
